Package toystore.financial

Class Currency

java.lang.Object
toystore.financial.Currency
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Currency
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Used to describe a currency, with a name(RON, EUR), symbol($, Â£), and parity relative to EURO (GBP has 1.1 parity because a GBP is worth 1.1 EURO). Controls operations between prices and currencies, such as: changing prices based on parity, updating parity and changing prices of Product objects from the singleton Store

Holds a static map that keeps track of all valid currencies, making querying and insertion fast operations. It is done by mapping each currency by it's name, since there cannot be 2 currencies with the same name. Implements methods for retrieving, adding and existence checking since the map is private.

Class implements Serializable, since the singleton Store wants to serialize everything it contains.

See Also:
Serialized Form
